sense.gloss: to run along, to run beside, to stick to (a line)
to follow (a policy, plan, etc.), to act in accordance with, to align with
to meet (wishes, expectations, etc.), to satisfy, to comply with, to live up to

sdata.j: ご↑希望↑↓きぼう↓に|↑沿↑↓そ↓う|ように↑努力↑↓どりょく↓します。
sdata.e: I'll try to meet your wishes.
